abstract: Investigation finds pervasive sexual abuse at Rhode Island private boarding institution St George's School, with at least 61 students victimized during 1970s and 80s; some speculate more victims will come forward and that case could become biggest school sex abuse case in United States history.
lead_paragraph: An investigation commissioned by St. George’s School in Rhode Island found that at least 51 students were abused by staff members in the 1970s and ’80s.
